snippet: The 26-year-old right-hander Dillon Gee had the clot removed after being examined Monday and was placed on the disabled list. The clot is unlikely to be career threatening.
abstract: New York Mets pitcher Dillion Gee is placed on the disabled list after having a blood clot removed from his pitching shoulder.

byline.contributor: Lynn Zinser contributed reporting from New York and Tyler Kepner from Kansas City, Mo.

lead_paragraph: The 26-year-old right-hander Dillon Gee had the clot removed after being examined Monday and was placed on the disabled list. The clot is unlikely to be career threatening.

headline.seo: Mets Place Gee on Disabled List After Blood Clot Is Removed From Shoulder
headline.main: Blood Clot Puts Gee on the Disabled List
headline.print_headline: Blood Clot Puts Gee On the Disabled List
